law.catch_line: Hand-Bills – Name And Address Of Distributor.
law.full_text:
HAND-BILLS – NAME AND ADDRESS OF DISTRIBUTOR.
It shall be unlawful for any person to post or otherwise affix on public property, or distribute in any public place any hand-bills, placard, poster, pamphlet, or other printed matter that does not bear upon the face thereof the name and address of the person who caused the same to be distributed. This section does not in any way affect the provisions of Section 28.01.1 of the Los Angeles Municipal Code.

unit.catch_line: Hand-Bills, Signs – Public Places And Objects.
Hand-Bills, Signs – Beach Or Tideland Of City – Exception.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
HAND-BILLS – NAME AND ADDRESS OF DISTRIBUTOR. (§ 28.08)
HAND-BILLS – NAME AND ADDRESS OF DISTRIBUTOR. It shall be unlawful for any person to post or otherwise affix on public property, or distribute in any public place any hand-bills, placard, poster, pamphlet, or other printed matter that does not bear upon the face thereof the name and address of the person who caused the same to be distributed. This section does not in any way affect the provisions of Section 28.01.1 of the Los Angeles Municipal Code.
